title: ReferenceError: artifacts is not defined
body:
- [x] I've asked for help in the Truffle Gitter before filing this issue.

## Issue
I'm able to run `truffle test` in the terminal fine, however when I try to run tests via [VSCode test explorer](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=hbenl.vscode-mocha-test-adapter) it outputs "ReferenceError: artifacts is not defined" while trying to load the tests. Am I able to do something to resolve this, like importing something or editing some setting?

## Steps to Reproduce
The line in test JS file leads to error: `const Contract = artifacts.require("Contract")`

## Expected Behavior
I expect the tests to run fine through VSCode test explorer (like how it works when [using Hardhat](https://hardhat.org/guides/vscode-tests.html))

## Actual Results
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17552475/105233817-42c40f80-5b62-11eb-8289-0507a65ae2e8.png)

## Environment
* Operating System: W10
* Ethereum client: Ganache
* Truffle version: 5.1.58
* node version: 14.0.0
* npm version: 6.14.8

Have you provide something different in the  `testEnvironment` ? 
Look in your truffle config file.
I'm not very familiar with the VSCode test explorer. You might check with them and report this issue. Sorry I can't be of more help!
@caleteeter Is there somewhere that you could recommend for @mlntr to ask about this issue?

@eggplantzzz @mlntr I believe this is caused because this extension you [referenced](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=hbenl.vscode-mocha-test-adapter) is using mocha directly.  Truffle tests are a wrapper around mocha which sets up the provider, contract abstractions, not to mention the ganache instance to create a clean state for each test run.

I have been trying to setup this manually in the test and will post that here.
Did you use yarn instead of npm for installing truffle globally?
NPM, not yarn @edugrip
Any luck, having this same issue
I asssume that artifacts is a globally available package when you install truffle globally. If truffle is installed gloabally it should ideally work.
Hey @caleteeter, Not sure how to proceed here. Is there anything actionable on Truffle's side for this issue? Thanks!
Any updates? Having the same issue here.
^ Same issue here
any update?
Pretty simple, Try using  truffle test instead of npm run start.
would be great to get this one sorted at some point
Any updates on this issue? im facing the same
Please what's the fix?
Same issue here! Ran it with truffle test, still didn't work :/
same issues, any recommendation?
had the same issue and  'npm install -g truffle'   fixed it

Hello, if still having this problem please do following:

In each migration file with the undefined artifacts.require(), require the following at the top of the file --->

const { artifacts } = require("truffle");

Hope that helps!
Not working
Same problem

> Hello, if still having this problem please do following:
> 
> In each migration file with the undefined artifacts.require(), require the following at the top of the file --->
> 
> const { artifacts } = require("truffle");
> 
> Hope that helps!

This worked for me

> Hello, if still having this problem please do following:
> 
> In each migration file with the undefined artifacts.require(), require the following at the top of the file --->
> 
> const { artifacts } = require("truffle");
> 
> Hope that helps!

This worked for me too, but instead of using require, I used import. Same thing just a different way to import.  

`import { artifacts } from "truffle"`

I guess it just wasn't able to find the artifact in that specific file in the VSCode.
i have the same issue
i have the same issue...
@michaeljohnbennett , @kevinbluer any insights on this?
What I found that you can still run the code. But its just an eslint error I suppose, so must be some VSCode config issue

i have the same issue, i tried both way's of import and does't work
i sending pictures of terminal with and without import from above
![issue 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/95530030/153386697-501ca306-dec6-4742-b239-9139f19edf41.png)
![issue 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/95530030/153386699-7405fe47-b07c-490a-a9a1-733fff60d0a1.png)
